job_1.title: Senior Python Developer
job_1.description: We are looking for an experienced Senior Python Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience with Python, FastAPI, and cloud technologies. Experience with machine learning and AI is a plus. Responsibilities include developing scalable web applications, working with databases, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

job_2.title: Data Scientist
job_2.description: Seeking a Data Scientist to work on predictive modeling and analytics projects. The role involves building machine learning models, analyzing large datasets, and creating insights for business decisions. Strong skills in Python, R, and statistical analysis are required.

job_3.title: Frontend React Developer
job_3.description: Looking for a Frontend Developer with expertise in React and modern JavaScript. The candidate will be responsible for building user interfaces, implementing responsive designs, and working closely with UX/UI designers. Experience with TypeScript and testing frameworks is preferred.
